I can't see them!
Suddenly he is bumped by a shark.  Willie sees one only t feet away.  They are surrounded.  Suddenly Jones stare to taunt the sharks aggressively.
All right!  I've had enough of this shit!  You want meat, motherfucker?  Come on, eat me, sucker, try some dark meat!
He pushes away from the group despite Beck's attempt to s him. JONES(cont'd) (taunting sharks) What's wrong you snout-nosed bastards?  My meat too tough for you?!
Amazingly the sharks begin to disappear.  Willie and Beck watch stunned.  Even Jones is surprised. JONES(cont'd) (to Willie and Beck) Whoa!  Did you see those fools run?  They know whose boss.
He jabs his arm upward in triumph and for the first time SEE a gash across his forearm.
As Jones crows triumphantly, WE SUDDENLY SEE HIS WET SUIT

Jones is chortling, suddenly his smile vanishes, somethin is happening... WE hear the DRONE OF THE APPROACHING HELICOPTER...THUMP, THUMP, THUMP...The blades of the helicopter sound out ove the waves.  It's lights are visible.  Willie and Beck wav frantically as Jones drifts closer to them!
JONES' LEGS  His wet suit is now completely split open an

head_text.subj: WE SEE THE BLACK SCALES SPREADING

text: hovers over the group below and lands on the water.  Its blades beat the surface into waves.  The WINCH OPERATOR hurls out a rescue harness and Beck helps Willie into the ring.  He CLICKS the fastener and suddenly they both lock eyes.  Before Willie can say anything Beck falls back and signals the Winch operator who begins hauling her to safe Immediately Beck locks back at Jones and extends his arm.
Jonesy...Give me your hand!
WILLIE reaches the helicopter and quickly climbs out of t harness.  The Winch operator throws it back across the wa where BECK grabs the harness.
C'mon, Jones!
Jones reaches out his hand.  He is almost there WHEN

head_text.subj: SUDDENLY RISING OUT OF THE WATER BEHIND THEM IS THE
SIXPACK/BOWMAN CREATURE IN ALL ITS HIDEOUS GLORY
GRUESOME, ITS LONG TEETH GLIMMER IN THE LIGHT. IT GOES F
BECK BUT JONES MOVES BETWEEN THEM.

text: Jonesy, No!
Get out of here, Becky!

The Creature grabs Jones and pulls him violently under. Beck watches horrified as his friend disappears.  Numbed clips the rescue harness around him when suddenly, WE SEE boiling of water where Jones disappeared...bubbles rising...and then Jones' bloody and tattered life vest bo to the surface several feet away from Beck. Beck reaches out for it just as the Creature appears agai It turns and focuses on Beck.  Beck keeps going for the l vest as the Creature starts for him.
The Winch operator and Willie watch in horror as the Creature bears down on Beck.
Is he in the harness!

CLOSE ON JONES' TATTERED VEST  Beck reaches it.  His fing wrap around the bicycle pump-like, seismic tool in Jones' vest pocket.  The Creature is right on top of him! CHUNK, CHUNK, Beck cocks it like a pump shotgun as tentac rise wickedly out of the water and wrap around Beck's bod in a death grip.  It's horrible mouth starts to open.
C'mon, motherfucker open up!

The Creature's mouth widens and as it starts to strike Be thrusts the seismic tool into its gaping maw and  is suddenly pulled from behind--out of the creature's grasp! The rescue cable is taut!  The helicopter is taking off! BECK'S POV/ RISING SHOT.  Beck rises suddenly out of the water, the Creature growing instantly smaller below him until BOOM! the Seismic device explodes in the Sixpack/Bowman Creature, blowing it to bits across the oc surface!  The shock wave sends the helicopter banking off toward the ship with Beck safely attached by cable below The winch operator pulls him in.
Beck, dressed now in crisp white clothes, stands on deck the ship.  He glances occasionally at a door nearby marke INFIRMARY, then looks up as the Captain approaches and shakes his hand.
Mr. Beck, I understand you passed your physical with flying colors.  And Ms. Williams?
(worried) I don't know yet, she's still in there.
Well, you'll be glad to know you have a friend onboard.
Beck looks up surprised as suddenly Martin joins them.
(excitedly) Beck!  I told them you'd make it.  No one back at TransOcean believed me, but I never gave up on you once. (smiling) So, how are you feeling?
Beck looks at Martin for an instant then hauls off and in one incredibly smooth punch knocks Martin on his can acro the deck.
Better...A lot better.
Just then the door to the infirmary opens and Willie appe with a new outfit on.  Smiles at Beck.
I'm fine!
Beck lets out a slight sigh of relief as a STEWARD approaches with a tray of WHOLE COOKED FISH, HIDEOUS LOOK
The sight is almost too intense for Beck and Willie.  The Captain notices.
I thought we might have some wonderful seafood.  But, if there's something else you'd rather have...
Willie stares at the tray of seafood uneasily then looks the Captain and smiles.
How about a burger and fries?
She and Beck laugh as they sit at a finely set table on t deck with the Captain. AS WE PULL BACK the ship becomes smaller and smaller in t distance and WE ARE AT THE
riding the swells, rising and falling before slipping beneath the waves and descending again into the cold depths.
